price: 52.Nabiyow keenih cus :Yalli Qhiyaamah ayro korosuk Yi- agleytit akkaluk sugteenimiy Qibaadal yot agleh hayteeniih tu-siinih xiqtam как akkaluk sugteenih seeca keenik iyya waqdi tu-siinih xiqeenik, tokkel nee wada axcuk keenih seecaanaah ken moggolan, kaadu ken kee usun aqbudak sugeenimik fanal inkih elle finqitan arac hayne (jahannam gira kinnuk).
arabic: وَيَوۡمَ يَقُولُ نَادُواْ شُرَكَآءِيَ ٱلَّذِينَ زَعَمۡتُمۡ فَدَعَوۡهُمۡ فَلَمۡ يَسۡتَجِيبُواْ لَهُمۡ وَجَعَلۡنَا بَيۡنَهُم مَّوۡبِقٗا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wayawma yaqūlu nādū shurakāiya alladhīna zaʿamtum fadaʿawhum falam yastajībū lahum wajaʿalnā baynahum mawbiqan
